about_the_game:
Cursedville is a party game that can be played between 4-10 people with two roles. Try to co-operate with other players with positional voice chat. Werewolves hunt peasants at night, while peasants try to survive the night and collect gold.


The werewolf is the villain of the game. The werewolf can transform into wolf form at any time during the night. The werewolf's goal is to hunt down all the villagers before the blood moon ends.



The peasants are the innocent role of the game. Peasants must try to survive until the bloody moon ends. They can earn gold by killing monsters that appear on the map at night. With gold they can buy new and more powerful items from merchants in the morning and fight against werewolves.

Features


Day Cycle:
The game has 3 day states, each with different features
Night:
  • Werewolves can transform.
  • Creatures appear in their territory.
Morning:
  • Werewolves can't leave human form.
  • Merchants are activated.
  • Creatures do not spawn.
Bloody Moon:
  • Werewolf can't leave wolf form.
  • Creatures do not spawn.

Creatures:
There are two types of creatures in the game. These creatures can harm peasants. Gold or items can be earned by killing creatures. It has a spawn and attack area depending on the creature type.
Skeleton:
  • Drops a small amount of gold.
  • Deals a small amount of damage.
  • Does not drop items.
Golem:
  • Drops a good amount of gold.
  • Deals a large amount of damage and throws the player he hit.
  • It drops the lightning potion, the most powerful potion in the game. Lightning potion can only be obtained this way.

Merchants:
Weapons and potions can be purchased from merchants using gold. Merchants are only open in the morning. These items have various properties and tactics can be created with different combinations.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gt 940 4gb or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
